data.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3 soundtrack: Full list of songs
data.meta_description: Ahead of the movie landing in cinemas, writer-director James Gunn has revealed the official soundtrack for Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.
data.text:
James Gunn's Guardians of the Galaxy trilogy has always stood out from the other films in the MCU for a number of reasons – from its intergalactic setting to its style of comedy – and one of the other standout features has been the director's use of music.

Advertisement

For his third and final instalment of the sci-fi Marvel franchise, Gunn has once again packed the soundtrack with a mixture of popular hits and less familiar tunes from years gone by, this time incorporating songs from the '80s and '90s rather than just the '70s.

Speaking to RadioTimes.com and other media at a press conference ahead of the film's release, Gunn explained how it has become a little more difficult for him to select songs over the years.

"It has become strange ‘cause the first two albums were huge hits," he said. "They changed the lives of some of these artists who now have big hit songs. And so, I know that when I’m choosing a song, it’s going to be something that a lot of people listen to."

Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3 soundtrack is available to buy now

He added: "It was very difficult choosing the music for this movie because in the first two movies, they were basically all ‘70s pop hits. In this one, you know, Yondu gives Peter Quill a Zune at the end of the second movie and it’s music from the ‘70s, ‘80s,‘90s, 2000s. So, it was very difficult because of that."

More like this

Kicking off with Radiohead's Creep, the soundtrack for Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3 also includes songs from the likes of Earth, Wind & Fire, Beastie Boys, and Florence + The Machine.

Read on for the full list of songs in the upcoming movie, which you can listen to now on Amazon Music.

Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3 soundtrack: Full list of songs

Creep (acoustic version) - Radiohead

Crazy on You - Heart

Since You Been Gone - Rainbow

In the Meantime - Spacehog

Reasons - Earth, Wind & Fire

Do You Realize?? - The Flaming Lips

We Care A Lot - Faith No More

Koinu No Carnival - EHAMIC

I'm Always Chasing Rainbows - Alice Cooper

San Francisco - The Mowgli's

Poor Girl - X

This Is the Day - The The

No Sleep Till Brooklyn - Beastie Boys

Dog Days Are Over - Florence + The Machine

Badlands - Bruce Springsteen

I Will Dare - The Replacements

Come and Get Your Love - Redbone

Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3 soundtrack is available to buy now

You can watch Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 1 and 2 on Disney Plus right now. Sign up to Disney Plus for £7.99 per month.

Guardians of the Galaxy: Vol 3 is released on Wednesday 3rd May 2023. Looking for something else to watch? Check out the best TV series on Netflix and best movies on Netflix, or visit our TV Guide and Streaming Guide.
